name: building_id
description: building identification number

name: geo_level_1_id
description: geographic region in which building exists, from largest (level 1) to most specific sub-region (level 3)

name: geo_level_2_id
description: geographic region in which building exists, from largest (level 1) to most specific sub-region (level 3)

name: geo_level_3_id
description: geographic region in which building exists, from largest (level 1) to most specific sub-region (level 3)

name: count_floors_pre_eq
description: number of floors in the building before the earthquake.

name: age
description: age of the building in years.

name: area_percentage
description: normalized area of the building footprint.

name: height_percentage
description: normalized height of the building footprint.

name: land_surface_condition
description: surface condition of the land where the building was built

name: foundation_type
description: type of foundation used while building

name: roof_type
description: type of roof used while building

name: ground_floor_type
description: type of the ground floor

name: other_floor_type
description: type of constructions used in higher than the ground floors (except of roof)

name: position
description: position of the building

name: plan_configuration
description: building plan configuration

name: has_superstructure_adobe_mud
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Adobe/Mud.

name: has_superstructure_mud_mortar_stone
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Mud Mortar - Stone.

name: has_superstructure_stone_flag
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Stone.

name: has_superstructure_cement_mortar_stone
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Cement Mortar - Stone.

name: has_superstructure_mud_mortar_brick
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Mud Mortar - Brick.

name: has_superstructure_cement_mortar_brick
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Cement Mortar - Brick.

name: has_superstructure_timber
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Timber.

name: has_superstructure_bamboo
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of Bamboo.

name: has_superstructure_rc_non_engineered
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of non-engineered reinforced concrete.

name: has_superstructure_rc_engineered
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of engineered reinforced concrete.

name: has_superstructure_other
description: flag variable that indicates if the superstructure was made of any other material.

name: legal_ownership_status
description: legal ownership status of the land where building was built

name: count_families
description: number of families that live in the building.

name: has_secondary_use
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used for any secondary purpose.

name: has_secondary_use_agriculture
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used for agricultural purposes.

name: has_secondary_use_hotel
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used as a hotel.

name: has_secondary_use_rental
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used for rental purposes.

name: has_secondary_use_institution
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used as a location of any institution.

name: has_secondary_use_school
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used as a school.

name: has_secondary_use_industry
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used for industrial purposes.

name: has_secondary_use_health_post
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used as a health post.

name: has_secondary_use_gov_office
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used fas a government office.

name: has_secondary_use_use_police
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was used as a police station.

name: has_secondary_use_other
description: flag variable that indicates if the building was secondarily used for other purposes.

name: damage_grade
description: Target variable (1,2,3)
